descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/apg2vp.png[/img]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2hgu0xv.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2m5jvkg.png[/img]
Cute Designs and Henna Body Art is something made in Photoshop,learning and discovering it most for
personal use and interest.I've got happy about it and i did find it beautiful and i thought i share
with some of you as well.When i say a few is because Cute Designs is only for The Ashen race and the
tattoos are only for UNP body.I am using them,i'm no modder,still i wanted to share to give something
back to this wonderful community.And hey if u like them i'll be more happy :)

I know i'm not iven close to perfection and remember i open Photoshop two weeks ago so u may like,
u may not.All negative comments are gonna be ignored completely and for the rest just enjoy :)
On my character they look good,on yours maybe not.I cant "fix" it because The Ashen race is using
custom made CharGen morphs so u may need to adjust it by playing a bit with the sliders in character
creation screen,but i said maybe.I highly recommand to use an ENB of your liking as in vanilla lighting
it doesn't render so good.

Cute Designs adds to the game 18 standalone face complexions.why? Because saving them as a complexion keeps
the detail i wanted,warpaints not.And again they may not look perfect i cant do anything about that either,
the way they look in Photoshop it's a dream,but in game renders differently.Same i cant play so much with
colors as well just cuz of this reason.I really hope i find a solution for it in the future,but for now
is like this.

Henna Body Art is a set of tattoos made with Henna brushes in Photoshop,for now they are just parts of
the body,i'm working and challenged myself to make the whole body,but for that i need to study this art
in more detail and basically know how to piece all together,otherwise makes no sense,maybe more like
this one i just made,but like i said i need to know more :P

None of this have been possible without my recent passion for Photoshop,my Duc and Milla who's resources
i've used with her permission.Both of them have an important role in my life and i wanna thank them
again and big hugs :D She is licensed and profesional,i higly respect and love her artwork.I hope one
day i can compare myself to her :)

For those who use Extended Slider Colors!In order to work u have to use the ExtendedColorsPatcher.exe
Just patch CuteDesigns.esp just like u did for the race.Instructions u find in the mod's page description.

Oh and about requests i'm not taking any,not because i don't want to,but because i need time and i want
to do it my way,learning process,fail process and so on.Hope u understand :)

I hope u guys enjoy and be more unique a lil' bit :)
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/dqpuvr.png[/img]
Duc my lil' squirrel for always being there for me in everything & making the esp :)
Milla for her kind words and amazing resources,i cant thank you enough :)
Danessa thank you,i wish i could have talked to you as well :)
Seren for taking the lil' time he has and answering my pm's,making this as a face
complexion,he was the one who told me:)
Wast1980,thank you,cuz of you i've got interested in Phoptoshop in the first place :)
And all the other authors who's work i've used to take my screenshots
brokefoot(Dandelion armor),Apachii(SkyHair),Radioragae and DragonAge7 (Hair packs of
Fallout3 and the fixed version of them),zzjay & cazy (Cazy hairs),dimon99 & calyps
(unp and unpb body),Pinup Poser by Halofarm
Everyone else who liked my(still not entirely) own humble designs,Duc,trustinall,
schmoops9,kamikazekossori,BravoOscar,Wast1980,zzjay.If i forgot someone i'm sry,
thank you anyway :D
Next one will be only my own and i hope to amaze :D
Bethesda Game Studios,thank you,Skyrim is definitely legendary :)

P.S If anyone is interested into Milla's (Atenais) resources u can have a look [url=http://www.renderosity.com/homepage.php?page=1&userid=546257] Milla [/url]

Update : Compatibility with Ashen Race 2.6DG .Two versions are included,one for Dawnguard edition of the mod and one standard! As well fixed the issue where some users had they'r character stuck in one position as a vampire!Hope this got fixed,let me know if it's working or if u encounter any other problems with it!Thank you :)
author: Cosmina

files.name: Psd files for Henna Body Art
